snippet: TABACHNIK--Bernard. Beloved husband of Carolyn, devoted father of Richard Tabachnik, Robin Croen and her husband, Kevin, loving grandfather of Brett, Alex, Geffen, Elah, Peleg and Noga. Service 12 noon, Tuesday, March 15, 2016 at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Lustgarten Foundation would be appreciated. 1/3
lead_paragraph: TABACHNIK--Bernard. Beloved husband of Carolyn, devoted father of Richard Tabachnik, Robin Croen and her husband, Kevin, loving grandfather of Brett, Alex, Geffen, Elah, Peleg and Noga. Service 12 noon, Tuesday, March 15, 2016 at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Lustgarten Foundation would be appreciated. 1/3
